name: cordova-app-loader
description: Cordova App Loader - remote update your cordova app

scripts.prepublish: cp bootstrap.js www/bootstrap.js && gluejs --include index.js --include node_modules/cordova-file-cache/index.js --main index.js --global CordovaAppLoader > www/lib/CordovaAppLoader.js
